verses.verse: And the second <WH8145> lot <WH1486> came forth <WH3318> <WH8799> to SHim`on <WH8095>, even for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095> according to their families <WH4940>: and their inheritance <WH5159> was within <WH8432> the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063>.
And they had in their inheritance <WH5159> Be'er-Sheva <WH884>, or SH'va <WH7652>, and Moladah <WH4137>,
And Hazarshual <WH2705>, and Balah <WH1088>, and Azem <WH6107>,
And Eltolad <WH513>, and Bethul <WH1329>, and Hormah <WH2767>,
And Ziklag <WH6860>, and Bethmarcaboth <WH1024>, and Hazarsusah <WH2701>,
And Bethlebaoth <WH1034>, and Sharuhen <WH8287>; thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> and their villages <WH2691>:
Ain <WH5871>, Remmon <WH7417>, and Ether <WH6281>, and Ashan <WH6228>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892> and their villages <WH2691>:

And all the villages <WH2691> that were round about <WH5439> these cities <WH5892> to Baalathbeer <WH1192>, Ramath <WH7414> of the south <WH5045>. This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095> according to their families <WH4940>.

Out of the portion <WH2256> of the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095>: for the part <WH2506> of the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> was too much <WH7227> for them: therefore the children <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095> had their inheritance <WH5157> <WH8799> within <WH8432> the inheritance <WH5159> of them.

And the third <WH7992> lot <WH1486> came up <WH5927> <WH8799> for the children <WH1121> of Z'vulun <WH2074> according to their families <WH4940>: and the border <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was unto Sarid <WH8301>:

And their border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> <WH8804> toward the sea <WH3220>, and Maralah <WH4831>, and reached <WH6293> <WH8804> to Dabbasheth <WH1708>, and reached <WH6293> <WH8804> to the river <WH5158> that is before <WH6440> Jokneam <WH3362>;

And turned <WH7725> <WH8804> from Sarid <WH8301> eastward <WH6924> toward the sunrising <WH4217> <WH8121> unto the border <WH1366> of Chislothtabor <WH3696>, and then goeth out <WH3318> <WH8804> to Daberath <WH1705>, and goeth up <WH5927> <WH8804> to Japhia <WH3309>,

And from thence passeht on along <WH5674> <WH8804> on the east <WH4217> <WH6924> to Gittahhepher <WH1662>, to Ittahkazin <WH6278>, and goeth out <WH3318> <WH8804> to Remmonmethoar <WH7417> to Neah <WH5269>;
And the border <WH1366> compasseht <WH5437> <WH8738> it on the north side <WH6828> to Hannathon <WH2615>: and the outgoings <WH8444> thereof are in the valley <WH1516> of Jiphthahel <WH3317>:
And Kattath <WH7005>, and Nahallal <WH5096>, and Shimron <WH8110>, and Idalah <WH3030>, and Beit-Lechem <WH1035>: twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Z'vulun <WH2074> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
And the fourth <WH7243> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> <WH8804> to Yissakhar <WH3485>, for the children <WH1121> of Yissakhar <WH3485> according to their families <WH4940>.
And their border <WH1366> was toward Yizre`el <WH3157>, and Chesulloth <WH3694>, and Shunem <WH7766>,
And Hapharaim <WH2663>, and Shion <WH7866>, and Anaharath <WH588>,
And Rabbith <WH7245>, and Kishion <WH7191>, and Abez <WH77>,
And Remeth <WH7432>, and Engannim <WH5873>, and Enhaddah <WH5876>, and Bethpazzez <WH1048>;

And the coast <WH1366> reacheth <WH6293> <WH8804> to Tavor <WH8396>, and Shahazimah <WH7831>, and Bethshemesh <WH1053>; and the outgoings <WH8444> of their border <WH1366> were at Yarden <WH3383>: sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Yissakhar <WH3485> according to their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> and their villages <WH2691>.
And the fifth <WH2549> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> <WH8799> for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families <WH4940>.
And their border <WH1366> was Helkath <WH2520>, and Hali <WH2482>, and Beten <WH991>, and Achshaph <WH407>,
And Alammelech <WH487>, and Amad <WH6008>, and Misheal <WH4861>; and reacheth <WH6293> <WH8804> to Karmel <WH3760> westward <WH3220>, and to Shihorlibnath <WH7884>;

And turneth <WH7725> <WH8804> toward the sunrising <WH4217> <WH8121> to Bethdagon <WH1016>, and reacheth <WH6293> <WH8804> to Z'vulun <WH2074>, and to the valley <WH1516> of Jiphthahel <WH3317> toward the north side <WH6828> of Bethemek <WH1025>, and Neiel <WH5272>, and goeth out <WH3318> <WH8804> to Cabul <WH3521> on the left hand <WH8040>,
And Hevron <WH5683>, and Rehob <WH7340>, and Hammon <WH2540>, and Kanah <WH7071>, even unto great <WH7227> Zidon <WH6721>;

And then the coast <WH1366> turneth <WH7725> <WH8804> to Ramah <WH7414>, and to the strong <WH4013> city <WH5892> TZor <WH6865>; and the coast <WH1366> turneth <WH7725> <WH8804> to Hosah <WH2621>; and the outgoings <WH8444> thereof are at the sea <WH3220> from the coast <WH2256> to Achzib <WH392>:
Ummah <WH5981> also, and Aphek <WH663>, and Rehob <WH7340>: twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
The sixth <WH8345> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> <WH8804> to the children <WH1121> of Naftali <WH5321>, even for the children <WH1121> of Naftali <WH5321> according to their families <WH4940>.

And their coast <WH1366> was from Heleph <WH2501>, from Allon <WH438> to Zaanannim <WH6815>, and Adami <WH129>, Nekeb <WH5346>, and Jabneel <WH2995>, unto Lakum <WH3946>; and the outgoings <WH8444> thereof were at Yarden <WH3383>:

And then the coast <WH1366> turneth <WH7725> <WH8804> westward <WH3220> to Aznothtabor <WH243>, and goeth out <WH3318> <WH8804> from thence to Hukkok <WH2712>, and reacheth <WH6293> <WH8804> to Z'vulun <WH2074> on the south side <WH5045>, and reacheth <WH6293> <WH8804> to Asher <WH836> on the west side <WH3220>, and to Y'hudah <WH3063> upon Yarden <WH3383> toward the sunrising <WH4217> <WH8121>.
And the fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892> are Ziddim <WH6661>, Zer <WH6863>, and Hammath <WH2575>, Rakkath <WH7557>, and Chinnereth <WH3672>,
And Adamah <WH128>, and Ramah <WH7414>, and Hazor <WH2674>,
And Kedesh <WH6943>, and Edrei <WH154>, and Enhazor <WH5877>,
And Iron <WH3375>, and Migdalel <WH4027>, Horem <WH2765>, and Bethanath <WH1043>, and Bethshemesh <WH1053>; nineteen <WH8672> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Naftali <WH5321> according to their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> and their villages <WH2691>.
And the seventh <WH7637> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> <WH8804> for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families <WH4940>.
And the coast <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was Zorah <WH6881>, and Eshtaol <WH847>, and Irshemesh <WH5905>,
And Shaalabbin <WH8169>, and Ajalon <WH357>, and Jethlah <WH3494>,
And Elon <WH356>, and Thimnathah <WH8553>, and Ekron <WH6138>,
And Eltekeh <WH514>, and Gibbethon <WH1405>, and Baalath <WH1191>,
And Yehud <WH3055>, and Beneberak <WH1139>, and Gatrimmon <WH1667>,
And Mejarkon <WH4313>, and Rakkon <WH7542>, with the border <WH1366> before <WH4136> Japho <WH3305>.

And the coast <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> too little for them: therefore the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> to fight <WH3898> <WH8735> against Leshem <WH3959>, and took <WH3920> <WH8799> it, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and possessed <WH3423> <WH8799> it, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> therein, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> Leshem <WH3959>, Dan <WH1835>, after the name <WH8034> of Dan <WH1835> their father <WH1>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.

When they had made an end <WH3615> <WH8762> of dividing the land <WH776> for inheritance <WH5157> <WH8800> by their coasts <WH1367>, the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> an inheritance <WH5159> to Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> among <WH8432> them:

According to the word <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> they gave <WH5414> <WH8804> him the city <WH5892> which he asked <WH7592> <WH8804>, even Timnathserah <WH8556> in mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>: and he built <WH1129> <WH8799> the city <WH5892>, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> therein.

These are the inheritances <WH5159>, which Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, divided for an inheritance <WH5157> <WH8765> by lot <WH1486> in Shiloh <WH7887> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>. So they made an end <WH3615> <WH8762> of dividing <WH2505> <WH8763> the country <WH776>.
